hypothesis_content.title: Liquid Altcoin Pairs with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: For highly liquid altcoin pairs (SOL/AVAX, DOT/LINK) with >$500M daily volume, when the 5-day price ratio diverges >12% from its 20-day moving average AND the underperforming asset shows increasing volume (volume ratio > 1.2), a mean reversion trade will be profitable within 7 days in NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In NEUTRAL markets, altcoin pairs trade in ranges. Volume confirmation indicates accumulation in the underperformer. High liquidity ensures minimal slippage. The 12% threshold avoids noise while capturing meaningful divergences. Event filter prevents fundamental disruptions.
entry_conditions: No major token unlocks or events in next 7 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Ratio returns to within 3% of 20-day MA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume confirmation fails to predict mean reversion (profitable rate < 55%), or the 12% threshold is too conservative (misses most opportunities) in 2023-2024 neutral periods.
